item.title: Identifying gender through Facebook posts
item.description:
A 2013 study featured in the research journal Plos One reveals that language use in social media can indicate a user’s gender and age. The study, “Personality, Gender, and Age in the Language of Social Media: The Open-Vocabulary Approach,” found that men and women choose distinct words and phrases online. Location and age also factor into language choices. Singapore bank DBS’ lucky red packets The study’s authors, from the University of Pennsylvania and University of Cambridge, noted that women tend to express emotions using words like “love,” “wonderful,” and “excited...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/identifying-gender-through-facebook-posts/
